content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The highlighted groove portion is angled in the YZ-plane with a negative slope of approximately 45 degrees. This aligns the stiffness matrix primarily with the Y and Z components.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 175, -75],
    [0, -75, 175]
  ]
}
```
